options.optionText: You weren’t kidding about being the best in the vault.
options.responseText: Please, I could make the Overseer himself beg for it. You? You just got the VIP treatment—feel special yet?

followUpOptions.optionText: Special? You should start charging tickets for this.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, honey, if I charged for it, this vault would be bankrupt. Guess you’re lucky I was feeling generous tonight.
Ahh, someone’s feeling brave. But you might need a couple hours... or days... to recover first. My pussy isn’t for the faint of heart.

options.optionText: Is this going to be a one-time thing?
options.responseText: Depends. Can you handle more of this? Or did I just ruin you for the rest of the vault? Don’t flatter yourself, I’ve got options ♥.

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m... gonna need a lot of rest first.
followUpOptions.responseText: Hah! Called it. Don’t worry, sweetie, take all the time you need to recover.

responseTexts: Bye now. Don’t worry, I won’t charge you for the mental images.
